about_the_game:
"If everyone is cheating, no one is cheating."

Cheaters Cheetah is a multiplayer FPS game where everyone is given ACTUAL CHEATS for the game. This includes typical wallhacks, aimbot, spinbot... and much more.

Developed with the help of a former cheat developer (yes, you read that right!), Cheaters Cheetah features a wild array of real-existing cheats. Outsmart and out-cheat your opponents in this one-of-a-kind FPS experience!

Unleash your inner cheetah

Wallhacks, aimbot, spinbot... you name it! All the cheats you know are free to be used in this arena.

But remember, your opponents will also have access to the same cheat. This creates a unique dynamic where everyone knows everyone else's position, leading to intense mind games and thrilling battles.

Go legit or rage?

Choose your config and dive into the chaos: "Legit cheat" where everyone only has wallhacks, or the "Rage cheat" where every feature is unlocked!

From the classic deathmatch to a "Raid boss" mode where multiple legit cheaters team up against 1 rage cheater, Cheaters Cheetah also offers a variety of unique game modes to choose from. The game also features a single player mode, where you can demolish innocent bots as a rage cheater!

BAN those filthy cheetahs with your own hand

The game is set in a prison for former cheaters, who were caught using cheats in a popular online FPS. Transformed into cheetahs, they are forced to participate in a game show "Cheaters Cheetah" as a punishment.

Winners will be granted with the "BAN Hammer", allowing them to BAN all of the losers from the game. Show no mercy to those scumbags!

name: Cheaters Cheetah

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Everyone will be given ACTUAL CHEATS in this multiplayer shooter. Use wallhacks and aimbots to your advantage and dominate the other cheetahs. The winner will get to BAN all losers!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
